data.name: Prophunt Dunder Mifflin
data.summary: Dunder Mifflin from the hit show Spongebob. Woobalooba ding dong as the main character Michael says. Supports Prophunt
data.description:
Attention all Dunder Mifflin employees. We've received reports that some of our office equipment has gone rogue, and we need you to hunt it down. But be careful, these supplies can change shape at any time!

Dunder Mifflin is an office branch based on the TV show 'The Office', now in Pavlov and built for for Prophunt. Fun fact, this was also the first community map to get Prophunt support, and the first public map uploaded to mod.io.

Come join us on the Prophunt Discord to discuss maps, play with other Prophunt fans, and find servers running the mode: https://discord.gg/mmXasFrUSS

This map has a ton of custom skins for free for all modes too, as well as a few gun skins.

If you'd like to support my maps, please consider donating. Donating £12 ($16) will get you access to the skin changers in all my maps:

https://www.patreon.com/Left4pillz
or alternatively:
https://paypal.me/Left4pillz
https://ko-fi.com/left4pillz

data.name: Resurgence
data.summary: Resurgence is an expansive extraction game mode that incorporates player progression, a comprehensive map, and fast-paced gameplay.
data.description:
Resurgence is an expansive extraction game mode that incorporates server saved progress, a comprehensive map, and fast-paced gameplay.

🖥️ Server: Resurgence.Live - Fast-Paced Extraction

The community server is shown under CUSTOM game mode, which is hidden by default. This experience is currently exclusive to the official server.

💬 Discord Invite:

  • resurgence.live
  • discord.gg/Qd34GHK3sp

📋 Features:

  • Polished gameplay and interaction
  • Server saved items and money in the Weapon Storage Locker
  • Weapon Marketplace and Medical Marketplace with rotating selections of weapons and supplies
  • Loot crates of varying types, each containing items of different rarities
  • Keycards that grant access to containers holding modified weapons
  • C4 explosives that can be used to open safes filled with money
  • Deploy from a plane onto the map to get a unique starting point in each session, whether you're with a team or not
  • Interactive doors that can be sprinted through or manually opened
  • Limited immersive custom UI

🤝 Credits:

  • roobes - Map help/asset placement
  • spin_uk - Building assets
  • Golden - Push Advanced Pack
  • Creative Commons:
    • Toyota Land Cruiser - Renafox - CC Attribution-NonCommercial
    • Jeep Cherokee - Renafox - CC Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike
    • Gmc Sierra Work Truck - Renafox - CC Attribution-NonCommercial
    • Ruined Cars (Small Freebie) - Renafox - CC Attribution-NonCommercial
    • Ammo Pouch - AAA-Assets - CC Attribution
    • DOMO Handheld Vacuum Cleaner - Jonas Vanelstlande - CC Attribution
    • Garmin Foretrex 401 wrist GPS - Mateusz Woliński - CC Attribution-NonCommercial
data.description_plaintext:
RESURGENCE IS AN EXPANSIVE EXTRACTION GAME MODE THAT INCORPORATES SERVER SAVED PROGRESS, A COMPREHENSIVE MAP, AND FAST-PACED GAMEPLAY.

-------------------------

🖥️ SERVER: RESURGENCE.LIVE - FAST-PACED EXTRACTION

The community server is shown under CUSTOM game mode, which is hidden by default. This experience is currently exclusive to the official server.

-------------------------

💬 DISCORD INVITE:

	* RESURGENCE.LIVE
 	* DISCORD.GG/QD34GHK3SP

-------------------------

📋 FEATURES:

	* Polished gameplay and interaction
 	* Server saved items and money in the Weapon Storage Locker
 	* Weapon Marketplace and Medical Marketplace with rotating selections of weapons and supplies
 	* Loot crates of varying types, each containing items of different rarities
 	* Keycards that grant access to containers holding modified weapons
 	* C4 explosives that can be used to open safes filled with money
 	* Deploy from a plane onto the map to get a unique starting point in each session, whether you're with a team or not
 	* Interactive doors that can be sprinted through or manually opened
 	* Limited immersive custom UI

-------------------------

🤝 CREDITS:

data.name: Dust 2 CSGO
data.summary: 8.20 update: The map environment optimization further prompts the quality, shack has been supported synchronously, please wait a few seconds for the start of the game and the frame rate will be normal, and the quest version will be optimized later.
data.description:
• 8.21 Update: Added the middle door impenetrable bunker, synchronized with CS:GO
  • 8.20 Update: The map environment optimization further prompts the quality. Shack has been supported synchronously. Please wait a few seconds for the frame rate to return to normal. The quest version will be optimized later, so stay tuned. If you have any questions, please submit a message on mod.io
  •  
  • 8.1 Fixed: The size of the map document has been reduced to around 500MB, with optimized map shadows. Gun reflections will no longer be overexposed.
  •  
  • 7.8 Update: Join the csgo full map environment sound effect, the game has a stronger sense of substitution! If you have any questions, leave a message and give feedback, thank you
  • 7.6 Fixed bullet penetration in wooden boxes and gates, ladders to increase speed [All boxes and doors are bullet penetrable (except the middle door)]
  • 6.26 is updated as follows: Fixed the distance between DM mode and TDM teammates and enemies, increased the speed by 20% Hidden ladder speed fixed the bug that the dustbin at the gate A could go up Dust 1 will be on the shelves by then Mod.io needs a small partner Go to subscribe and download
  • 2023.6.18 Optimized environment details and fixed some bugs
    If there are any bugs on the map, please leave a message in the mod.io comment section

If you have any questions, please leave a message to: https://discord.gg/wfTYqJMB
data.description_plaintext:
* 8.21 UPDATE: ADDED THE MIDDLE DOOR IMPENETRABLE BUNKER, SYNCHRONIZED WITH CS:GO
 	* 
 	* 8.20 Update: The map environment optimization further prompts the quality. Shack has been supported synchronously. Please wait a few seconds for the frame rate to return to normal. The quest version will be optimized later, so stay tuned. If you have any questions, please submit a message on mod.io
 	*  
 	* 8.1 Fixed: The size of the map document has been reduced to around 500MB, with optimized map shadows. Gun reflections will no longer be overexposed.
 	*  
 	* 7.8 Update: Join the csgo full map environment sound effect, the game has a stronger sense of substitution! If you have any questions, leave a message and give feedback, thank you
 	* 7.6 Fixed bullet penetration in wooden boxes and gates, ladders to increase speed [All boxes and doors are bullet penetrable (except the middle door)]
 	* 6.26 is updated as follows: Fixed the distance between DM mode and TDM teammates and enemies, increased the speed by 20% Hidden ladder speed fixed the bug that the dustbin at the gate A could go up Dust 1 will be on the shelves by then Mod.io needs a small partner Go to subscribe and download
 	* 2023.6.18 Optimized environment details and fixed some bugs 
If there are any bugs on the map, please leave a message in the mod.io comment section

If you have any questions, please leave a message to: https://discord.gg/wfTYqJMB

data.description: "This fan favorite map from Black Ops has returned in a big way for Pavlov. It has been re-designed from the ground up to highlight Treyarch’s new momentum-based, chained-movement system, allowing players to battle in this adrenaline-charged new NUK3TOWN map. Set in the year 2065, players will experience a fresh take on this classic run-and-gun, close-quarters multiplayer map."

data.name: Kino Der Toten Testing CODz
data.summary: Testing Modkit for CODz UE5 (WIP)
data.description:
Kino der Toten (CODz Updated version) Made by MichelCats

Testing Modkit for CODz UE5 (WIP)

NEED TO PLAY ONLINE OR IT WILL NOT WORK PROPERLY.

What's on the map?

  • 8x Player character models from CodZ. 4x WAW And 4x BO3. Richthofen, Nikolai, Takeo and Dempsey
  • 4x Zombies 🧟‍♀️ models and animations from Codz.
  • Helldogs 🐾 models and animations from Codz.
  • Nova 6 crawlers. Models and animations from Codz.
  • Pap machine, Teleporter, Traps, wall buys, and all the things that you expect from Kino der Toten.
  • Custom guns 🔫
  • 9 Perks 🍾
  • Revive system ❤️‍🩹
  • Wunder fizz.
  • Ray gun and wunderwaffe
  • Gum-ball 🔮 machine.
  • Monkey 🐒 bomb 💣
  • Infection 🧟‍♂️ mode. (When activate at the start game, if the player bleeds out 🩸 he will become a zombie and need to kill other players.) syringes 💉 Also to become a zombie and a cure syringe 💉 to cure players.
  • Boss fight. (Fill the teddy bear 🧸 with souls)
  • And more.

 

Thanks to:

  • KillerJim: For the info, I need for even making this map.
  • LethalDumpster: For the materials, sounds, effects, and more.
  • xCeezyx: For the CodZ mod. To make the whole zombie mode possible.
  • Coolroo for The extra perks
  • TreshyBoi: Making The extra perks work to mod. Also helped with bullet shells out of custom guns.
  • Rumzy: Materials pack!
  • Treyarch: CoD BO1 & 3: Guns.
  • Treyarch: CoD BO1 & 3: Map geometry and models
  • Sledgehammer & Raven Software: CoD WW2 Guns
  • Gavkips for a lot of new custom guns from Cold War and Thunder Gun.

 

Perks

  1. Double tap 2.0
  2. Widows 🕷 Wine 🍷
  3. Speed Cola 👋
  4. Juggernog ⛑
  5. Stamin-Up 🏃‍♂️💨
  6. Quick Revive ❤️‍🩹
  7. Electric Cherry ⚡️🍒
  8. Deadshot 💀🎯 Daiquiri 🍸
  9. Pheonix Up ❤️‍🔥(Saves you from a fatal blow then has a 15-second cooldown) (hidden perk)

https://youtu.be/QTCQFQpYVZI


To adjust the sounds if they are too loud:

  • If you look at you're wrist where you see the players, there is also a Tab with settings. There you can adjust all the sounds you want.

 

To do in order:

  1. Make the map work in UE5.1.1
  2. Update the map with the parity update from soro.


If anyone or a zombie gets stuck please report it so I can fix it for you guys.
You can leave a comment in the comment section.
or discord: @MichelCats#2870
Thanks for the support

data.name: Euphrates [Push]
data.summary: 3 stage push map
data.description:
A 3 stage modern push map.

 

This map has been ported from ue4 but is currently work in progress to be made stable for UE5.  I am currently looking at optimisation and then will look at classes to add attachments and other improvements to loadouts.

 

Map features latest version of my breakable mesh.  Windows should have multi stage damage triggered by bullets or objects such as guns and grenades passing through.  PC monitors will blow if shot.

Map also features animated background with planes taking off, helicopters flying overhead and more.

data.description:

Floating Isles is a medium sized map set on floating islands in the depths of space. This map was built for Prophunt, but also supports every gamemode in Pavlov except Push.

This map also has working elevators, as well as 2 platforms circling the map you can jump onto. It also has a ton of custom skins that can be used in free for all modes.

The original map was de_shevat_ka from Counter Strike Source.

data.name: PavCraft (Closed Alpha)
data.summary: Under Construction! dont download a Mining Building Crafting Mod
data.description:
Welcome to PavCraf

This is a prealpha version. The game is full of bugs I recommend not to play it yet.

Wait for the release!

Release Mid 2023

What PavCraft offers

Realtime (MC) Day night cycle
-Mining system
You can collect resources anywhere in the world
Use the appropriate tools
Some resources you can find only in Dungons
-Building system
Except for some locked areas, you can build freely on the map, just like Minecraft.
-Crafting system
You can craft ammunition, weapons and other items yourself
-Housing and Savegame System
You can claim rooms, houses or plots on the server and store your items and weapons there for later sasions.
-Custom creatures
You will meet many familiar opponents
-Custom items
There are countless items that will help you survive in PavCraft


Feel free to visit me on Discord and Patreon (pages are still under construction)
https://discord.gg/F6K9EqQpTE
patreon.com/user?u=87468118


Planned features

-Farming System
-Multible Islands
-Custom Guns
-Mele Waepons
-Nether and End

data.name: Suijin (TF2)
data.summary: Visit the Japanese mountain ranges, in this beautiful map from Team Fortress 2 with full CTF support. Just select the gamemode "Team Deathmatch" and the map will automatically load the CTF mode
data.description:
Take a trip to Japan and pay tribute to Suijin, in this beautiful map from Team Fortress 2. 

Select the gamemode "Team Deathmatch" and the map will automatically load the CTF mode. You can grab the enemy intelligence from their base, and bring it back to your own base to receive 3 random items which may assist you. If you capture the intel 8 times, your team wins and the round ends.

This map supports every gamemode in Pavlov, and works particularly well for TDM, Push, and KOTH. It also has a ton of custom skins for free for all modes.

If you'd like to support my maps, please consider donating. Donating £12 ($16) will get you access to the skin changers in all my maps:

data.name: CQB-Silo
data.summary: Made for the Arctic CQB mapping contest.
data.description:
CQB-Silo

 

Made for the 2023 Arctic CQB mapping competition. 

 

Close quarter combat in tight corridors and multi level missile silo.  

 

Designed to be playable with all official playable gamemodes. 

I would love to hear any feedback, leave a comment or catch me on discord, #workshop channel.

The map is also a bit of a test playground for effects, materials and blueprints that I'm working on. 

Features:

dynamic weather effects (thunderstorm with procedural thunder and lightning)
day/night cycle that progresses over time (it takes about 8-10 minutes of play time to go from late evening to full night).
Custom breaking glass
Live camera feeds on security monitors of both team starts and both SND/Push objective points.  I'm hoping to add the ability to shoot out the cameras to kill the video feed.
Real time clocks.
Interior walls, missile and various objects around the map pick from 8 variations at the start of the map so the map looks a little different every time.

Almost all materials and meshes made by me.  Used a couple of megascan asseets and some consoles and crates from asset packs.

data.name: 007 Bunker
data.summary: Agent, it's time for you to get your arse down to the Severnaya Bunker Complex in Siberia, and retrieve vital intel about the Goldeneye program. Supports all gamemodes except Prophunt
data.description:
Agent, it's time for you to get your arse down to the Severnaya Bunker Complex in Siberia, and retrieve vital intel about the Goldeneye program. If you refuse, we can always ask Johnny English to go in your place, he was the king of England once, you know.

007 Bunker is a map made for Goldeneye Source, and this map was originally ported by Kennithh.

This map has custom skins for free for all modes, and Sean Connery bond skins for TDM/SND and other team based modes.

This map supports every gamemode, except for Prophunt. 

Big thanks to Kennithh for sending me this map to continue updating it in future.

data.summary: Aztec from CS:GO ported into Pavlov. Original map by Valve.
data.description:
SUPPORTS:

Deathmatch

Team Deathmatch

Last Man Standing

Search & Destroy

Gun Game

starting the journey of putting my ports onto the new Pavlov branch is the first CS:GO port I ever did, Aztec! I've improved various parts of it including more accurate lighting, the original skybox, rain particles, fixed Z-fighting and collisions, and a few more things! enjoy!

if you encounter any issues please let me know in the comments or my Steam profile! thanks!

 

 

 

also perorero from vrmassive server is my very dear friend!! :) (not being held under gunpoint to say this no way haha)
